transcripts.text: Do you think he walked up to some random guy and punched him in the head?
And did he punch from in front or behind?
He was behind.  He walked up to him.

It's on video.  I know, it is on video, isn't it?  I'll include the video now.  Your biggest problem with Tommy is that video.  you're saying where he may have, may not have been joking about... Oh, he's joking?  I don't know, I haven't seen it.  Was he serious?  I don't know because in the beginning you used my joke as a serious...
The guy has hit many people.  You must have seen him hit an England fan the other day.
Yeah, I also watched what happened and I spoke to his wife who told me what had happened, who was behind the camera filming it.
Oh, but I thought that Tommy told his wife to go away.  But she was actually behind the camera.  So Tommy's a liar now, is he?
He said he sent his wife away.  So Tommy's a liar, is he?

Listen, there's a lot of things people will say to protect their partners.  I don't blame him.  I don't know where you got that from.  Are you denying Tommy's wife was there?  Are you denying her version of what happened?  Do you think he walked up to some random guy and punched him in the head?
And did he punch from in front or behind?
He was behind.  He walks up to him.
It's on video.  I know, it is on video, isn't it?
I'll include the video now.  Okay, so I'll describe the video now.  So Tommy charges about five meters towards him and then smacks him round the head from the side or the back.

And as he was... That's what I saw.  As he was describing it, you've seen it there in slow motion.  Okay.  Now this is a great example of how the left... See, view reality and how they tell it.  There's a big difference.

I've literally described to you how I'm going to edit it.
